name: Juice Fresh
description:
In the game, you must make combinations on the playing field of three or more identical fruits. At the beginning of the game, the entire field is filled with different fruits in a random order, and the player connects them together. If as a result of this movement, a row of vertical, horizontal, diagonal of three or more, identical fruits are formed, then they are, and new ones appear instead.

Features:
- Puzzle with simple rules
- Pleasant animations
- 100 levels
